# juggler2

## Introduction

A DEPRECATED R package to manipulate BUGS model code in the JAGS dialect.

## Installation

To install from GitHub
```
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("poissonconsulting/juggler2")
```

## Inspiration

- [Nimble](http://r-nimble.org)
